about_the_game:
Golden Dagger Tailor Pack

The following is included in the Golden Dagger Tailor Pack comes with 2 new suits in 4 variations each, 4 new masks and 4 new gloves. Each try to make you fit in the upscale home of the Golden Dagger Triads leadership as you bust down their doors and ruin their day.

  • 2 Outfits with variations
  • 4 Masks
  • 4 Gloves

New outfits

The following outfits are included in the Golden Dagger Tailor Pack:
  • Red Pole
    With variations
    • Greyhound
    • Traditional
    • Ceremonial
    • Ritual
  • Master’s Mantle
    With variations
    • Red Master
    • Golden Master
    • Pond Master
    • Dark Master

New masks

The following masks are included in Golden Dagger Tailor Pack:
  • Golden Draped Visor
  • Sterling Draped Visor
  • Hornet Striker Helmet
  • Crimson Striker Helmet

New gloves

The following gloves are included in Golden Dagger Tailor Pack:
  • Firescale
  • Mountain Spikes
  • Hornet Glow Grips
  • Crimson Wave Grips

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: The Payday Gang sets out to put an end to the triads chapter. With the help of new allies, donned in fresh gear we set our sights on.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
